reviewText: Another brilliant documentary by Daniel Karslake.  Can't wait for his follow up to For the Bible Tells Me So.

Inspiring, hope-filled, brilliantly filmed documentary that follows ordinary people as they find a way to make a difference in the fight against global poverty & hunger. We'll watch it again and again!
Watch this movie and you will understand how every one of us can help people who are suffering. Everything about the movie is beautiful and well-done. Exceptional storytelling.
Overdone, the agenda of the movie overpowers the movie itself.
